data.actual_result: You are able to find people that are connected to a hidden voice channel you don't have permission to see.
data.expected_result: You are not supposed to find out if a user is connected in a hidden voice channel. Also, Mute/Deafen should not show up.
data.short_description: You are able to discover if a user is in a "hidden" or "private" voice channel by clicking their name
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a private or hidden voice channel with people in it.  - find someone you think that's in the hidden voice channel in the member list, and then proceed to click their name. If they're connected to the VC, a "Server Mute" and "Server Deafen" will show up under their name upon clicking them.
